plot: This first entry in the Angel Core series follows a young soldier (fighting for a fictional, futuristic empire) as he's transferred to a secret military installation, where's he surprised to discover that his new job will be having sex with gorgeous young "Angels," a group of genetically unique women who need regular intercourse to nurture their powers.
opening_theme: "Nearer, My God, to Thee" by Mokuren
ending_theme: "ANGEL・CORE~銀十字~ (ANGEL・CORE~The Silver Cross~)" by Mokuren
